forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 21C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 70F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 65F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
